jcr:content.jcr:title: List of cities in El Salvador

contentheadline.headline: List of cities in El Salvador

contentrichtext.text: [[Image:El salvador map.png|thumb|250px|Map of El Salvador]] [[File:Atardecer de San Salvador desde Los Planes de Renderos.jpg|thumb|250px|[[San Salvador, El Salvador|San Salvador]] Metropolitan Area]] ==Cities== Over 100,000 or a High Human Development Index, and a high urbanization. AMSS = San Salvador Metropolitan Area * [[Acajutla]] '''Pop. 47,678''' * [[Apopa]] '''Pop. 217,733''' (AMSS) * [[Antiguo Cuscatlán]] - Highest HDI in the country(0.896-very high) '''Pop. 55,608''' (AMSS) * [[Ciudad Delgado]] '''Pop. 174,825''' (AMSS) * [[Cuscatancingo]] '''Pop. 117,013''' (AMSS) * [[Ilopango]] '''Pop. 159,232''' (AMSS) * [[La Unión, La Unión|La Unión]] '''Pop. 26,739''' * [[Mejicanos]] '''Pop. 211,878'''(AMSS) * [[Metapán]] '''Pop.59,004''' * [[San Miguel, El Salvador|San Miguel]] '''Pop. 218,410''' * [[San Salvador, El Salvador|San Salvador]] (capital) '''Pop. City 540,989 Metro 2,290,000''' (AMSS) * [[Santa Tecla, El Salvador|Santa Tecla]] '''Pop. 164,171''' (AMSS) * [[Santa Ana, El Salvador|Santa Ana]] '''Pop 280,000''' * [[San Martín, San Salvador|San Martin]] '''Pop. 144,722''' (AMSS) * [[Sonsonate]] '''Pop. 110,501.''' * [[Soyapango]] '''Pop. 262,975''' (AMSS) ==Towns== Over 50,000, medium to low urbanization, or departmental capital. * [[Ahuachapán]] '''Pop. 110,511''' * [[Chalatenango, Chalatenango|Chalatenango]] '''Pop. 29,271''' * [[Cojutepeque]] '''Pop. 70,000''' * [[Nejapa]] '''Pop. 50,966''' * [[San Vicente, San Vicente|San Vicente]] '''Pop. 53,213''' * [[Tacuba]] '''Pop. 50,000''' * [[Usulután]] '''Pop. 71,636''' * [[Zacatecoluca]] '''Pop. 62,576''' ==Villages== Within the range of 1,001 to 49,999 or have a really low urbanization, and keeps the colonial look of the country. * [[Alegría, Usulután|Alegria]] '''Pop. 15,000''' * [[Arambala]] '''Pop. 1,821 ''' * [[Apaneca]] '''Pop. 8,597''' * [[Berlín]] '''Pop. 15,000''' * [[Comasagua]] '''Pop. 11,870 ''' * [[Conchagua]] '''Pop. 37,362''' * [[Concepción de Ataco]] '''Pop. 18,101''' - Tourist's favorite village. * [[Juayúa]] '''Pop. 24,465''' * [[Jujutla]] '''Pop. 39,596''' * [[La Palma, Chalatenango]] '''Pop. 24,000''' - village with coolest temperature (Daily Mean. 53F/12C Lowest Record 19.6F/-6C) * [[Nahuizalco]] '''Pop. 49,081''' * [[Santa Rosa de Lima, La Unión|Santa Rosa de Lima]] '''Pop. 27,693 ''' * [[Suchitoto]] '''Pop. 24,786''' ==See also== * [[Municipalities of El Salvador]] * [[List of Salvadoran departmental capitals]] * [[Geography of El Salvador]] * [[List of cities by country]] * [[Salvadoran Departments by HDI]] {{North America topic|List of cities in}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cities In El Salvador}} [[Category:Lists of cities by country|El Salvador, List of cities in]] [[Category:Populated places in El Salvador| ]] [[Category:El Salvador geography-related lists]]
